document_data.name: Magar al-Azim
document_data.mainbody: Sultan '''Magar al-Azim''' was the ruler of [[Sikak]] in the [[Pearl Cities]] region of [[west Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Magar was very popular in Sikak and often swept up into crowds when he roamed the city. He was accompanied by a group of ten [[ogre]]s who served as his bodyguards.
document_data.History: Magar was the fifteenth [[gnome]] to site on the "Throne of Coins" in Sikak since the time of the first [[Grand Caliph]]. Like all members of his family, Magar spent his youth working with fishermen and learning the value of fellowship, hard work and honesty.
document_data.Relationships: Magar fathered over twenty children from his ''harim'' which was filled with the most beautiful gnomes throughout [[Zakhara]].
